title: Black Appliances, Wood-Burning Fireplaces, Track Lighting
posting_body: ['EXPECT THE BEST.', 'Chateau Avalon places our residents in the ideal location of North Austin, right off Lamar Blvd near I35 and 183.', 'While you have the space to relax, we are only 15 minutes from the heart of downtown Austin, where you can enjoy music, entertainment and dining.', "Enjoy amenities that you can't find in the city, such as a resort-style swimming pool, outdoor seating area, a comfortable resident lounge and private gated parking.", 'Our two bedroom apartments boast wood-burning fireplaces, black appliances, washer and dryer connections, spacious balconies and we welcome all furry friends under 25 lbs!', 'Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is more than happy to help out with anything you may need.', 'Need something outside of regular business hours?', 'No worries, our online Resident Portal is there for rent payments and maintenance requests- 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.', "If you’ve been searching for a pet-friendly two bedroom apartment in Austin that's sophisticated and conveniently located, your search ends at Chateau Avalon.", 'Stop in and have a no-strings-attached look around the property to check us out!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 8', 'OR Text', '8', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 793-798 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Wood-Burning Fireplaces', '- Vinyl Plank Flooring', '- Track Lighting', '- Black Appliances', '- Full-Size Washer Dryer Connections', '- Eat-In Kitchen', '- Stone Fireplace Wall', 'Community Amenities', '- Cabana', '- On-Site Parking', '- Online Rent Payment', '- Private Patios & Balconies', '- Gated Community', '- Resort-Style Swimming Pool', '- Pet-Friendly', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Restrictions: 25lb weight limit.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-2:00PM', 'Chateau Avalon Apartments', '833 Fairfield Drive, Austin, TX, 78758', 'J1lTOcAgBIf']
